name: Cookie Crunch: Link Match
description:
“Cookie Crunch” is a very addictive FREE Link Match3 game.
Connect the same colored cookie to make a delicious chain!

Don't miss out this fun and relaxing game!

Download NOW & You can’t put it down easily!
Let’s Be the Best cookie collector!

HOW TO PLAY
• Match 3 or more cookies of the same color to connect!
• Special boosters & items to help you pass those tricky levels.
• Connecting all cookies with minimum moves to win higher scores

FEATURES

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 200 levels are unique and full of fun.
- Experience all the different challenges and puzzles!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- You can play anytime and anywhere.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

NOTES
• Cookie Crunch contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Cookie Crunch is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Coins.

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- none

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data


Contact us if you have any questions, ideas for improvements or experience any bugs when playing the game: help@puzzle1studio.com

Your feedbacks will be considered for our future updates.


Time to Crunch!
Thank you!
